sentence: Thom Tillis called Wednesday for the House Ethics Committee to investigate fellow North Carolina Republican Rep. Madison Cawthorn after watchdog agencies told the Washington Examiner the congressman could be implicated in an insider trading scheme,? reports Anna Kaplan: Tillis said in a tweet insider trading by a member of Congress is a serious betrayal of their oath,? adding that Cawthorn owes North Carolinians an explanation.?
